Don't take this as a flamer, FlightPirate, but what are you saying? It's ok to steal as long as it's not from a charity? We're all theives here, we all left our morality at the login screen, so rejoice my fellow theives and I'll see you all in Hell!

Thanks for the up Ugly Bob. Long live The Pirate Bay!

Any Rip version of it's Service Pack 1?

Thanks for the great upload.  Because the installer is for FSX, copying the folders from a temporary folder into FS9 works, but when the aircraft is loaded within FS2004, some tailplane and wingtip textures are missing.  This is just a heads up for those of you willing to use the DC-2 for FS9.
Could anyone please seed this? I need it! Thanks in advance ;)

If anybody downloads any torrent and stops seeding it when the download finishes, the torrent will die! I'm trying to download this for three days now and I only have 50%!! So please don't be selfish and seed! You are not the only one who wants the UIVER!!!
I`m still seedeng 27/7, sorry, my upload is limited by ISP :(
